file_content.text: Don't worry. The holocron will be safe here while I study it.
Master Dolso? Here's the holocron from House Thul's agents.
You have done well. I will meditate on the holocron and decide how best to use it.
Go in peace, and may the Force be with you.
Lieutenant Weeznod said you would recover the holocron from House Thul's agents.
Be at peace. I must meditate on the Force.
